summary: Comprehensive testing of AeroSense - Asthma & Allergy AI Co-Pilot completed. Backend API testing achieved 77.8% success rate with core features working. Frontend testing was highly successful with all major features functional including LLM integration, navigation, dark mode, and mobile responsiveness.

infrastructure_issues.issue: CORS headers not detected in OPTIONS request
infrastructure_issues.impact: May cause issues with some browser configurations

passed_tests: Symptom analysis with Gemini 2.5 Pro LLM integration
Homepage loading with navigation and feature cards
All page navigation (Symptoms, Triggers, Risk, Technique, Safety)
Symptom analysis frontend integration with backend
Environmental triggers page with demo data display
Inhaler technique analysis with interactive checklist
action_item_for_E1: Fix user history endpoint returning 500 error. Consider adding proper CORS headers for better browser compatibility. All core features are working well.
